_____________________________________________________

#### Reference and Closing Information
----------------------------------------

* Reference Number: WS4153479205-Doc4153520140
* Solicitation Number: WS4153479205
* Amendments: None
* Closing Date: Wednesday, September 26, 2023 2:00 PM AST

#### Contract Information
-------------------------

* Contract Type: Competitive Bid
* Contract Duration: Estimated to begin on November 1, 2023
* Areas of Service: Fredericton, New Brunswick

#### Description of the Contract
---------------------------------

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites qualified contractors to provide Building Mechanical System maintenance and repair services for the Department of National Defence (DND) at the New Brunswick Armouries.

* Required Services: Inspection and repair of building mechanical systems for the following areas:
	+ Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC)
	+ Plumbing systems
	+ Local exhaust systems
	+ Special mechanical systems (e.g., electrical and gas piping systems)
* Contract Terms: Labour, materials, tools, equipment, and transportation required for the services
* Contract Start Date: Estimated to begin on November 1, 2023

#### Notice and Inquiries
-------------------------

* Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) will provide all necessary information required to complete the contract through the Statement of Work in Annex A.
* All technical and contractual inquiries must be submitted in writing to Contracting Authority, Kate Mintzer, via email: [kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
